comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: George Miller Dyott (1883-1972) was a pioneer aviator. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Miller_Dyott

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton:  Thanks for Dyott's full name.  We'll add it to the description next time we update.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Dyott was in the news in 1913 for being thrown out of his plane, as the craft struck a utility pole while Dyott was trying to avoid hitting a crowd that ran toward the plane as he landed. New York Times story, August 1, 1913: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E0CE3DD1730E233A...
